about_the_game:
Welcome to Subcube, a thoughtful brain teasing puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! Get ready to expand your mind in a galaxy of rotating blocks, where your only objective is to construct a cube. With challenging levels that will test your reasoning on 3D space, you'll become a mastermind!

Featuring beautiful graphics and smooth gameplay, Subcube is the perfect game for puzzle lovers. Each level presents a unique challenge that will require you to think outside the box. Use your strategic skills to rotate the blocks and find the perfect solution to each puzzle.

With over 123 levels to play through, you'll never run out of new and exciting challenges. Plus, with Steam achievements you can compete with your friends and show off your skills to the world.

Don't miss out on this must-play puzzle game! Download Subcube now and start your journey to become a cube-solving mastermind!

  • 123 puzzles
  • Infinite mode
  • 24 achievements
  • No distractions, relaxing and thoughtful experience
  • No in-game purchases

Get ready to expand your mind in a galaxy of rotating blocks, where your only objective is to construct a cube. With challenging levels that will test your reasoning on 3D space, you'll become a mastermind!

Featuring beautiful graphics and smooth gameplay, Subcube is the perfect game for puzzle lovers. Each level presents a unique challenge that will require you to think outside the box. Use your strategic skills to rotate the blocks and find the perfect solution to each puzzle.

With over 123 levels to play through, you'll never run out of new and exciting challenges. Plus, with Steam achievements you can compete with your friends and show off your skills to the world.

Don't miss out on this must-play puzzle game! Download Subcube now and start your journey to become a cube-solving mastermind!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: linux 64 bit
  • Processor: Core2Duo 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: openl 3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Subcube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 or newer
  • Processor: Core2Duo 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: openl 3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“A spatial puzzler that melted my mind. Plenty to do if it scratches your itch.”
Good – Higher Plain Games

“Subcube is well made and if you're into these types of puzzles you should pick it up”
Great – Pepp's indie reviews
short_description: Subcube, a thoughtful brain-teasing puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! Get ready to test your mind in a world of rotating blocks, where your only objective is to construct a cube. With challenging levels that will test your spatial reasoning skills, you'll be enlightened!
